additional_data.description: The spirit of a young girl who died before making her mark on the world. Legend has it her final act was single-handedly stopping six trucks in a valiant effort to save a defenseless kitty from a flattened feline fate. True or not, it's certainly done wonders for her street cred.
additional_data.how_to_acquire:
◦ Obtained after clearing Chapter 1.
◦ Available in Jewel Summon after clearing Chapter 1.
additional_data.notes_and_trivia: ◦ At the end of Chapter 1, Sola calls her "Ray" to symbolize "ray of hope".

main: "Oh, stop being such a snivel baby!"
skill: "Think you're some bigshot, huh? Well, THINK AGAIN!"
summon: "I've never seen someone as tough as you!"
limit_break: "Wh-whoa! I'm, like, totally strong! Like, seriously!"
